blogPost.title:
Traders and others are taking to Twitter after Robinhood restricted trades on $GME and $AMC. "This is unacceptable," @AOC tweeted.

https://t.co/rt8iF4X17s
blogPost.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text:
在Robinhood限制了$GME和$AMC的交易后，交易员和其他人都在Twitter上进行交易。"这是不可接受的，"@AOC在推特上说。

https://t.co/rt8iF4X17s

在Robinhood限制了$GME和$AMC的交易後，交易員和其他人都在Twitter上進行交易。"這是不可接受的，"@AOC在推特上說。

https://t.co/rt8iF4X17s

previous.title:
It feels like 80% of every move Elon Musk makes is intelligent, forward-thinking and brilliant

...and 20% of every decision is meant to troll certain ppl who doubt him

localize.full_text:
感觉埃隆-马斯克的每一个举动，80%都是聪明的，有前瞻性的，也有精彩的。

......每一个决定的20%都是为了挖苦某些怀疑他的人。

感覺埃隆-馬斯克的每一個舉動，80%都是聰明的，有前瞻性的，也有精彩的。

......每一個決定的20%都是爲了挖苦某些懷疑他的人。

next.excerpt:
Hey everyone,

A year ago, I started building a program that scrapes Reddit and Twitter for
emerging stocks.

In 2020, it allowed me to pick up stocks such as PLUG, PENN or NET very early -
bought in respectively at $3, $10 and $20.

In 2021, I did a little experiment and decided to invest only in…
